section1.good_choice_reason1: provide a variety of essential vitamins and fibers, which are crucial for a healthy diet
section1.good_choice_reason2: be rich in dietary fiber and essential nutrients that support better digestion and overall health
section1.good_choice_reason3: be packed with antioxidants and nutrients to boost your health

section2.user_goals: reduce added sugar, reduce sodium, and increase vegetable intake

goal_feedback.feedback_text: Great work! You made great progress with reducing added sugar. This was due to your purchases of Milo's Lemonade Juice Drink 100% Natural because it contributed minimally to added sugars.

Great work! You made great progress with reducing sodium. This was due to your purchase of Prego Italian Tomato Pasta Sauce Flavored with Meat because it provided reasonable sodium content in a small portion.
goal_feedback.feedback_items: Prego Italian Tomato Pasta Sauce Flavored with Meat

goal_feedback.feedback_text: Some choices this week didn’t align with your dietary goals. You purchased Prego Italian Tomato Pasta Sauce Flavored with Meat, which didn’t contribute to your goal of increasing vegetable intake because it mostly contains tomatoes as the sole vegetable.
goal_feedback.feedback_items: Prego Italian Tomato Pasta Sauce Flavored with Meat

section3.fruits_explanation: The Fresh Yellow Nectarine and Fresh Gala Apple contributed to a high score for fruit. Fruits are essential for providing vitamins, minerals, and fiber. Keep up the good work with your fruit choices!
section3.vegetables_explanation: You had a low score due to limited vegetables in your basket. Vegetables are great to include in your diet as they are high in essential vitamins and minerals and low in calories, supporting overall health. Try including more green and leafy vegetables, which are particularly beneficial.
section3.grains_explanation: You did not purchase any whole grains, which resulted in a low score. Whole grains are important for providing energy and essential nutrients. Try choosing whole-grain bread or pasta next time.
section3.dairy_explanation: The freshlife Lactose Free 2% Reduced Fat Ultra Filtered Milk contributed to a high score in your dairy component. Dairy is important for bone health and provides essential nutrients like calcium and vitamin D. Keep it up!
section3.protein_explanation: You had a low score due to limited sources of varied proteins. Including a variety of protein sources, especially plant-based options like legumes and nuts, is beneficial for muscle health and energy.
section3.fattyacids_explanation: Your score was low; Velveeta Original Melting Cheese Dip & Sauce did not contribute enough to healthy fatty acids. Fatty acids, especially omega-3s, have been shown to improve heart health by reducing the risk of cardiovascular diseases. Try getting more fatty fish like salmon or plant-based sources like flaxseeds.

section4.refinedgrains_explanation: You effectively limited refined grains with choices like Nature's Own Perfectly Crafted White Bread. Limiting refined grains and opting for whole grains can improve diet quality and reduce blood sugar spikes. Keep it up!
section4.sodium_explanation: You managed your sodium levels well with items like Prego Italian Tomato Pasta Sauce Flavored with Meat. Keeping sodium levels in check is crucial for heart health. Good job!
section4.addedsugars_explanation: Milo's Lemonade Juice Drink 100% Natural shows you kept added sugars low. This is beneficial as high added sugar intake can contribute to weight gain and dental problems. Excellent work!
section4.saturatedfats_explanation: Kraft Singles Sharp Cheddar Slices contributed to a moderate intake of saturated fats. While some saturated fats are okay, try including more unsaturated fats like those found in avocados and nuts for heart health.

section5.recommendation1: Nature's Own Perfectly Crafted White Bread contributed to negative Whole Grains component score. Next week try whole-grain bread like Dave's Killer Bread for more fiber and nutrients.
section5.food_to_substitute1: Nature's Own Perfectly Crafted White Bread
section5.recommendation2: Velveeta Original Melting Cheese Dip & Sauce contributed to negative Fatty Acids component score. Next week try using Olive Oil or Avocado, which provide healthier fats.
section5.food_to_substitute2: Velveeta Original Melting Cheese Dip & Sauce
section5.recommendation3: Prego Italian Tomato Pasta Sauce Flavored with Meat contributed to negative Vegetable component score. Next week try adding Fresh Spinach or Kale to your meals for more nutrients.
section5.food_to_substitute3: Prego Italian Tomato Pasta Sauce Flavored with Meat
